title: Edge AI for Robotics
abstract: This poster presents a novel approach to deploying AI models on edge devices for robotic applications. We demonstrate real-time object detection and path planning on resource-constrained hardware.

title: Secure Multi-Party Computation
abstract: We introduce a new protocol for secure multi-party computation that enables collaborative data analysis while preserving privacy. Our method achieves 40% better performance than existing approaches.

title: 5G Network Slicing for IoT
abstract: This work explores network slicing techniques in 5G networks optimized for IoT deployments. We present a dynamic resource allocation algorithm that improves latency by 60%.

title: Explainable AI in Healthcare
abstract: We developed an explainable AI framework for medical diagnosis that provides interpretable insights to clinicians. Our system has been validated on real patient data with 95% accuracy.

title: Autonomous Drone Navigation
abstract: This poster showcases our autonomous navigation system for drones in GPS-denied environments. Using visual-inertial odometry and SLAM, drones can navigate complex indoor spaces.
